Token.Abstract: Describes required methods for an object wishing to be notified about the status of user actions.
Called when a User Request completes successfully.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: The user the action was performed on.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Abstract: The results of the completed request

Token.Abstract: Called when a User Request fails for some reason (including network failure, internal server failure, request issues...)

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: The user the operation was performed on.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An object that encodes our error message.
